name: The Salton Sea
description: After a tragic incident, a man drifts into a world populated by thugs and speed junkies.

review.author: lagapalooza
review.heading: Kilmer's best yet
review.reviewBody: This is the back shelf treasure that everyone hopes for when browsing the not-so-recent releases at the video store. Pay attention to the other reviews posted here - they're not kidding. This is a very well made film on every level. Great script, acting is standout, direction is thoughtful and involved. Not for kids.
